title.zh: 欧盟体外诊断医疗器械法规 (EU) 2017/746
title.en: Regulation (EU) 2017/746 on In Vitro Diagnostic Medical Devices (EU IVDR)

scope.zh: 适用于在欧盟市场上市或投入使用的体外诊断医疗器械及其附件。
scope.en: Applies to in vitro diagnostic medical devices and their accessories placed on the EU market or put into service.

classification.summary_zh: IVD按风险分为A（最低）至D（最高）四类，分类规则见附件VIII。
classification.summary_en: IVDs classified A (lowest) to D (highest) risk per Annex VIII classification rules.

key_articles.summary_zh: 与MDR Art.10类似，制造商须确保IVD符合附件I GSPR、维护技术文档、建立QMS和PMS体系、在EUDAMED注册、分配UDI、任命PRRC。
key_articles.summary_en: Similar to MDR Art.10: manufacturers must ensure IVDs comply with Annex I GSPR, maintain technical documentation, establish QMS and PMS systems, register in EUDAMED, assign UDI, appoint PRRC.

key_articles.summary_zh: Class A → 自我声明；Class B → 附件IX或附件X+XI；Class C → 附件IX或附件X+XI；Class D → 附件IX（含附件X设计检验）。
key_articles.summary_en: Class A → self-declaration; Class B → Annex IX or Annex X+XI; Class C → Annex IX or Annex X+XI; Class D → Annex IX (including Annex X design examination).

key_articles.summary_zh: 制造商须按附件XIII开展性能评价，证明IVD在正常使用条件下的分析性能和临床性能。
key_articles.summary_en: Manufacturers must conduct performance evaluation per Annex XIII to demonstrate analytical and clinical performance of IVDs under normal conditions of use.

transition_timeline.event_en: EU IVDR fully applicable (Class D IVDs)
Deadline for Class C IVD legacy devices

transition_timeline.event_zh: B类 + A类无菌IVD遗留器械截止
transition_timeline.event_en: Deadline for Class B + Class A sterile IVD legacy devices

transition_timeline.event_zh: A类无菌以外IVD遗留器械截止
transition_timeline.event_en: Deadline for remaining Class A IVD legacy devices (non-sterile)
